name: Mikey Boots
summary:
The good news? Mikey's got an awesome new pair of rocket boots that allow him to fly through the air at great speeds. The bad news? The boots won't turn off and can't be removed. Uh-oh! Zip through more than 40 new stages, weaving between incoming missiles, maneuvering around treacherous spikes, and scooping up as many coins as you can. 
 
As usual, each course offers plenty of potential paths and a hidden secret or two. You'll have to master the rocket boots to shave off every millisecond in pursuit of a top time. Be sure to keep an eye out for those hidden Golden Shorts while you're at it. They'll go great with your new boots if you can pick them up. And, for the first time ever in a Mikey game, you can play as a different character. Use the coins you collect to unlock a wide range of disguises (230!) to customize either character with.
